participant_1.background:
I start my day with a hot cup of coffee to keep me going through the heat.
i eat out more than three times a week.
I am happy with my parents.
I enjoy spending time with my loved ones and being active.
I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag to my friends about my delicious home grown vegetables.
i am a cat person.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, because it helps me to stay positive and focused on raising my sons.
i like to create art.
I bought a book for myself and my cats to read together.

content.text: I'm doing alright! I just got back from a long run.
Oh how fun! I'm not a runner myself. I like to play sports, though.
I love sports, too! I play soccer and basketball. Do you have any pets?
I have two cats! They're my best friends.
Cats are awesome! I used to have a cat named Mittens.
I love to read books. I just bought a book to read with my cats.
That's so sweet! I love reading, too. I usually read nonfiction books.
I like reading both fiction and nonfiction. I love to learn new things.
Me too! I think it's important to stay informed about the world around us.
I agree! I like to stay up-to-date on current events.
I love to have conversations about current events. It's interesting to hear what other people think.
Me too! I love learning new perspectives.
I think we would get along great!
